p: The series of 5-(pyridin-2-ylmethyl)-1,3,4-thiadiazol-2-amine derivatives 11â€“ 16 were synthesized by intramolecular cyclization of the corresponding hydrazinecarbothioamides under acidic conditions and the activity against HIV-1 was tested on MT-4 cells by MTT assay using efavirenz as a standard drug [ 64].
